attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: government plans change the law, which will enable them to ban users from using the internet must be stopped & challenged in the EU courts. To monitor what we surf when we surf & ban user's as they see fit is a total abuse of the very foundation of www. where no government or politician has the right to dictate to a nation their flavour of office!. We reguard this as a total abuse of office.

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
